definitions.definition: Silica based glass extruded into fibers that possess a length at least 1000 times greater than their width.
A composite material made from fine fibres of spun glass held together with resin .

main_definition: Silica based glass extruded into fibers that possess a length at least 1000 times greater than their width.
secondary_definitions: ( ellipsis ) A composite material made from fine fibres of spun glass held together with resin .
